content: https://www.forbes.com/sites/jemimamcevoy/2022/06/08/billionaires-remain-wary-of-bitcoin-but-theyre-buying-crypto-at-a-higher-rate-than-the-average-investor-forbes-survey-finds/?sh=3819fc726001"A survey of the 65 richest people in the world conducted by Forbes showed that almost 30% of billionaires directly or indirectly invest in cryptocurrencies.3.2% of respondents said they had invested more than half of their wealth in cryptocurrency, 18% reported investing at least 1% of their funds.Another 10% said they did not engage in such investments directly, but invested in companies related to cryptocurrency.
